about_the_game:
“The Legend of the Mask tells us of an unknown warrior chosen by an ancient Mask to inherit its power and become the mightiest luchador the world has ever seen. Fulfill the Ancient Prophecy by guiding a humble taxi driver to become the Legend of the Mask.”

Presents a unique combat mechanics that marry the elegant yet brutal art of lucha libre combat with 2D beat ’em up action

Defeat your enemies with a whole lucha libre move set with different types of attacks: Pommel, air, throw, pins/submission, plus real star signature, special and team moves

Chose from four main characters with their own unique stats and combat styles

Features some of the industry's biggest Mexican Lucha stars by collaborating with Masked Republic like Konnan & Mr Iguana, and more to be announced soon

Immerses players in the vibrant, exciting Mexican lucha libre lore and culture

Celebrates Mexico’s Lucha cinematic history with colorful enemies like Guanajuato Mummies, Werewolves, and colorful and charismatic characters like Chaneques, Evil Chihuahuas and even Killer Jalapeños

Takes players on adventures to landmarks and environments across beautiful & diverse Mexico

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 | AMD Radeon HD 6670
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Join the action in our 2D side-scrolling beat 'em up game for up to four players! Immerse yourself in the colorful world of Mexican Lucha Libre, where unique mechanics combine the elegant yet brutal art of lucha libre with classic combat. Team up and unleash spectacular moves to defeat your foes!
